      @Nullable protected @Nullable CompletableFuture<?> saveAdvancement(CachedOutput output, FinishedRecipe recipe, com.google.gson.JsonObject json)
      从类复制的说明: RecipeProvider
      Called every time a recipe is saved to also save the advancement JSON if it exists.
      覆盖:
      saveAdvancement 在类中 RecipeProvider
      返回:
      A completable future that saves the advancement to disk, or null to cancel saving the advancement.
